CustomField.description: Date when the payments should be collected by the bank. This is only used for direct debit methods with FinDock as processor (PaymentHub-BACS, PaymentHub-SEPA, etc.)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Date when the payments should be collected by the bank. This is only used for direct debit methods with FinDock as processor (PaymentHub-BACS, PaymentHub-SEPA, etc.)
CustomField.label: Collection Date
